name: Guitar Hero: World Tour

files.setup: N/A:Select the installer for Guitar Hero World Tour (.exe file)

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the installer for Guitar Hero World Tour (.exe file)
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Aspyr/Guitar Hero World Tour/GHWT.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing the game...
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
